exportÂ asyncÂ functionÂ compileSFCTemplate(

Â Â //Â MagicStringæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªéå¸¸å¥½ç”¨çš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ“ä½œåº“,ä¹Ÿå¦‚å®ƒçš„åå­—ä¸€æ ·,éå¸¸çš„ç¥å¥‡Â !

Â Â

Â Â constÂ astÂ =Â parse(code,Â {Â comments:Â trueÂ })
Â Â 
Â Â constÂ resultÂ =Â awaitÂ newÂ Promise((resolve)Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â transform(ast,Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â //Â astÂ nodeèŠ‚ç‚¹è®¿é—®å™¨
Â Â Â Â Â Â nodeTransforms:Â [
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â (node)Â =>Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ (node.typeÂ ===Â 1)Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â //Â åªè§£æhtmlæ ‡ç­¾Â 
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â ifÂ (node.tagTypeÂ ===Â 0Â &&Â !EXCLUDE_TAG.includes(node.tag))Â {
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â constÂ {Â baseÂ }Â =Â path.parse(id)
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â //Â è·å–åˆ°ç›¸å…³ä¿¡æ¯,å¹¶è¿›è¡Œè‡ªå®šä¹‰å±æ€§æ³¨å…¥
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â !node.loc.source.includes("data-v-inspecotr-file")
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â &&Â s.prependLeft(
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â node.loc.start.offsetÂ +Â node.tag.lengthÂ +Â 1,
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â `Â data-v-inspecotr-file="${id}"Â data-v-inspecotr-line=${node.loc.start.line}Â data-v-inspecotr-column=${node.loc.start.column}Â data-v-inspecotr-title="${base}"`,
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â )
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â }
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â }
Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Â },
Â Â Â Â Â Â ],

Â Â Â Â resolve(s.toString())

}

//Â SubtractÂ willÂ subtractÂ theÂ secondÂ valueÂ fromÂ theÂ first

//Â SubtractTypeSwitchÂ isÂ usedÂ toÂ subtractÂ usingÂ interfaces

Â switchÂ a.(type)Â {
Â caseÂ int:

Â caseÂ int64:

Â caseÂ float32:

Â default:

}

packageÂ functions

importÂ (
Â "math/rand"
Â "testing"

)
//Â Benchmark_SubtractÂ isÂ usedÂ toÂ determineÂ theÂ mostÂ performantÂ solutionÂ toÂ subtraction
funcÂ Benchmark_Subtract(bÂ *testing.B)Â {
Â //Â CreateÂ aÂ sliceÂ ofÂ randomÂ numbersÂ basedÂ onÂ theÂ numberÂ ofÂ iterationsÂ set
Â //Â toÂ testÂ theÂ performanceÂ ofÂ theÂ function
Â //Â DefaultÂ iterationsÂ forÂ meÂ isÂ 1000000000
Â //Â b.NÂ isÂ alwaysÂ 1Â soÂ weÂ canÂ useÂ thatÂ toÂ setÂ theÂ numberÂ ofÂ iterations
Â numbersÂ :=Â make([]int,Â 1000000001)
Â floatNumbersÂ :=Â make([]float32,Â 1000000001)
Â //Â CreateÂ aÂ randomÂ seed

Â seedÂ :=Â rand.NewSource(time.Now().UnixNano())
Â //Â GiveÂ theÂ seedÂ toÂ theÂ randomÂ package
Â randomizerÂ :=Â rand.New(seed)
Â forÂ iÂ :=Â 0;Â iÂ <Â b.N;Â i++Â {
Â Â //Â randomizeÂ numbersÂ betweenÂ 0-100
Â Â numbers[i]Â =Â randomizer.Intn(100)
Â Â floatNumbers[i]Â =Â float32(randomizer.Intn(100))
Â }
Â //Â runÂ aÂ benchmarkÂ forÂ regularÂ Ints
Â b.Run("SubtractInt",Â func(bÂ *testing.B)Â {
Â Â forÂ iÂ :=Â 0;Â iÂ <Â b.N;Â i++Â {
Â Â Â SubtractInt(numbers[i],Â numbers[i+1])
Â Â }
Â })
Â //Â runÂ aÂ benchmarkÂ forÂ regularÂ Floats
Â b.Run("SubtractFloat",Â func(bÂ *testing.B)Â {
Â Â forÂ iÂ :=Â 0;Â iÂ <Â b.N;Â i++Â {
Â Â Â SubtractFloat32(floatNumbers[i],Â floatNumbers[i+1])
Â Â }
Â })
Â //Â runÂ aÂ benchmarkÂ forÂ TypeSwitchedÂ Ints
Â b.Run("Type_Subtraction_int",Â func(bÂ *testing.B)Â {
Â Â forÂ iÂ :=Â 0;Â iÂ <Â b.N;Â i++Â {
Â Â Â SubtractTypeSwitch(numbers[i],Â numbers[i+1])
Â Â }
Â })
Â //Â runÂ aÂ benchmarkÂ forÂ TypeSwitchedÂ Floats
Â b.Run("Type_Subtraction_float",Â func(bÂ *testing.B)Â {
Â Â forÂ iÂ :=Â 0;Â iÂ <Â b.N;Â i++Â {
Â Â Â SubtractTypeSwitch(floatNumbers[i],Â floatNumbers[i+1])
Â Â }
Â })

Â //Â runÂ aÂ benchmarkÂ forÂ GenericÂ Ints
Â b.Run("Generic_Subtraction_int",Â func(bÂ *testing.B)Â {
Â Â forÂ iÂ :=Â 0;Â iÂ <Â b.N;Â i++Â {
Â Â Â Subtract[int](numbers[i],Â numbers[i+1]Â "int")
Â Â }
Â })
Â //Â runÂ aÂ benchmarkÂ forÂ GenericÂ Floats
Â b.Run("Generic_Subtraction_float",Â func(bÂ *testing.B)Â {
Â Â forÂ iÂ :=Â 0;Â iÂ <Â b.N;Â i++Â {
Â Â Â Subtract[float32](floatNumbers[i],Â floatNumbers[i+1]Â "float32")
Â Â }
Â })
Â //Â runÂ aÂ benchmarkÂ whereÂ genericÂ typeÂ isÂ infered
Â b.Run("Generic_Inferred_int",Â func(bÂ *testing.B)Â {
Â Â forÂ iÂ :=Â 0;Â iÂ <Â b.N;Â i++Â {
Â Â Â Subtract(numbers[i],Â numbers[i+1])
Â Â }
Â })
}
